name: 100 Movie Quotes
description: AFI's 100 Years... 100 Movie Quotes is a list of the top 100 quotations in American cinema.
author: Alex Sparkes

quotes.quote: Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn.
quotes.author: Gone with the Wind

quotes.quote: I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse.
quotes.author: The Godfather

quotes.quote: You don't understand! I coulda had class. I coulda been a contender. I could've been somebody, instead of a bum, which is what I am.
quotes.author: On the Waterfront

quotes.quote: Toto, I've a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore.
quotes.author: The Wizard of Oz

quotes.quote: Here's looking at you, kid.
quotes.author: Casablanca

quotes.quote: Go ahead, make my day.
quotes.author: Sudden Impact

quotes.quote: All right, Mr. DeMille, I'm ready for my close-up.
quotes.author: Sunset Boulevard

quotes.quote: May the Force be with you.
quotes.author: Star Wars

quotes.quote: Fasten your seatbelts. It's going to be a bumpy night.
quotes.author: All About Eve

quotes.quote: You talkin' to me?
quotes.author: Taxi Driver

quotes.quote: What we've got here is failure to communicate.
quotes.author: Cool Hand Luke

quotes.quote: I love the smell of napalm in the morning.
quotes.author: Apocalypse Now

quotes.quote: Love means never having to say you're sorry.
quotes.author: Love Story

quotes.quote: The stuff that dreams are made of.
quotes.author: The Maltese Falcon

quotes.quote: E.T. phone home.
quotes.author: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial

quotes.quote: They call me Mister Tibbs!
quotes.author: In the Heat of the Night

quotes.quote: Rosebud.
quotes.author: Citizen Kane

quotes.quote: Made it, Ma! Top of the world!
quotes.author: White Heat

quotes.quote: I'm as mad as hell, and I'm not going to take this anymore!
quotes.author: Network

quotes.quote: Louis, I think this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship.
quotes.author: Casablanca

quotes.quote: A census taker once tried to test me. I ate his liver with some fava beans and a nice Chianti.
quotes.author: The Silence of the Lambs

quotes.quote: Bond. James Bond.
quotes.author: Dr. No

quotes.quote: There's no place like home.
quotes.author: The Wizard of Oz

quotes.quote: I am big! It's the pictures that got small.
quotes.author: Sunset Boulevard

quotes.quote: Show me the money!
quotes.author: Jerry Maguire

quotes.quote: Why don't you come up sometime and see me?
quotes.author: She Done Him Wrong

quotes.quote: I'm walkin' here! I'm walkin' here!
quotes.author: Midnight Cowboy

quotes.quote: Play it, Sam. Play 'As Time Goes By.
quotes.author: Casablanca

quotes.quote: You can't handle the truth!
quotes.author: A Few Good Men

quotes.quote: I want to be alone.
quotes.author: Grand Hotel

quotes.quote: After all, tomorrow is another day!
quotes.author: Gone with the Wind

quotes.quote: Round up the usual suspects.
quotes.author: Casablanca

quotes.quote: I'll have what she's having.
quotes.author: When Harry Met Sally...

quotes.quote: You know how to whistle, don't you, Steve? You just put your lips together and blow.
quotes.author: To Have and Have Not

quotes.quote: You're gonna need a bigger boat.
quotes.author: Jaws

quotes.quote: Badges? We ain't got no badges! We don't need no badges! I don't have to show you any stinking badges!
quotes.author: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre

quotes.quote: I'll be back
quotes.author: The Terminator

quotes.quote: Today, I consider myself the luckiest man on the face of the Earth.
quotes.author: The Pride of the Yankees

quotes.quote: If you build it, he will come.
quotes.author: Field of Dreams

quotes.quote: Mama always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.
quotes.author: Forrest Gump

quotes.quote: We rob banks.
quotes.author: Bonnie and Clyde

quotes.quote: Plastics.
quotes.author: The Graduate

quotes.quote: We'll always have Paris.
quotes.author: Casablanca

quotes.quote: I see dead people.
quotes.author: The Sixth Sense

quotes.quote: Stella! Hey, Stella!
quotes.author: A Streetcar Named Desire

quotes.quote: Oh, Jerry, don't let's ask for the moon. We have the stars.
quotes.author: Now, Voyager

quotes.quote: Shane. Shane. Come back!
quotes.author: Shane

quotes.quote: Well, nobody's perfect.
quotes.author: Some Like It Hot

quotes.quote: It's alive! It's alive!
quotes.author: Frankenstein

quotes.quote: Houston, we have a problem.
quotes.author: Apollo 13

quotes.quote: You've got to ask yourself one question: 'Do I feel lucky?' Well, do ya, punk?
quotes.author: Dirty Harry

quotes.quote: You had me at 'hello.'
quotes.author: Jerry Maguire

quotes.quote: One morning I shot an elephant in my pajamas. How he got in my pajamas, I don't know.
quotes.author: Animal Crackers

quotes.quote: There's no crying in baseball!
quotes.author: A League of Their Own

quotes.quote: La-dee-da, la-dee-da.
quotes.author: Annie Hall

quotes.quote: A boy's best friend is his mother.
quotes.author: Psycho

quotes.quote: Greed, for lack of a better word, is good.
quotes.author: Wall Street

quotes.quote: Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer.
quotes.author: The Godfather Part II

quotes.quote: As God is my witness, I'll never be hungry again.
quotes.author: Gone with the Wind

quotes.quote: Well, here's another nice mess you've gotten me into!
quotes.author: Sons of the Desert

quotes.quote: Say 'hello' to my little friend!
quotes.author: Scarface

quotes.quote: What a dump.
quotes.author: Beyond the Forest

quotes.quote: Mrs. Robinson, you're trying to seduce me. Aren't you?
quotes.author: The Graduate

quotes.quote: Gentlemen, you can't fight in here! This is the War Room!
quotes.author: Dr. Strangelove

quotes.quote: Elementary, my dear Watson.
quotes.author: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes

quotes.quote: Take your stinking paws off me, you damned dirty ape.
quotes.author: Planet of the Apes

quotes.quote: "Of all the gin joints in all the towns in all the world, she walks into mine.
quotes.author: Casablanca

quotes.quote: Here's Johnny!
quotes.author: The Shining

quotes.quote: They're here!
quotes.author: Poltergeist

quotes.quote: Is it safe?
quotes.author: Marathon Man

quotes.quote: Wait a minute, wait a minute. You ain't heard nothin' yet!
quotes.author: The Jazz Singer

quotes.quote: No wire hangers, ever!
quotes.author: Mommie Dearest

quotes.quote: Mother of mercy, is this the end of Rico?
quotes.author: Little Caesar

quotes.quote: Forget it, Jake, it's Chinatown.
quotes.author: Chinatown

quotes.quote: I have always depended on the kindness of strangers.
quotes.author: A Streetcar Named Desire

quotes.quote: Hasta la vista, baby.
quotes.author: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

quotes.quote: Soylent Green is people!
quotes.author: Soylent Green

quotes.quote: Open the pod bay doors, HAL.
quotes.author: 2001: A Space Odyssey

quotes.quote:
Striker: Surely you can't be serious.
Rumack: I am serious … and don't call me Shirley.
quotes.author: Airplane!

quotes.quote: Yo, Adrian!
quotes.author: Rocky

quotes.quote: Hello, gorgeous.
quotes.author: Funny Girl

quotes.quote: Toga! Toga!
quotes.author: National Lampoon's Animal House

quotes.quote: Listen to them. Children of the night. What music they make.
quotes.author: Dracula

quotes.quote: Oh, no, it wasn't the airplanes. It was Beauty killed the Beast.
quotes.author: King Kong

quotes.quote: My precious.
quotes.author: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

quotes.quote: Attica! Attica!
quotes.author: Dog Day Afternoon

quotes.quote: Sawyer, you're going out a youngster, but you've got to come back a star!
quotes.author: 42nd Street

quotes.quote: Listen to me, mister. You're my knight in shining armor. Don't you forget it. You're going to get back on that horse, and I'm going to be right behind you, holding on tight, and away we're gonna go, go, go!
quotes.author: On Golden Pond

quotes.quote: Tell 'em to go out there with all they got and win just one for the Gipper.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne, All American

quotes.quote: A martini. Shaken, not stirred.
quotes.author: Goldfinger

quotes.quote: Who's on first.
quotes.author: The Naughty Nineties

quotes.quote: Cinderella story. Outta nowhere. A former greenskeeper, now, about to become the Masters champion. It looks like a mirac...It's in the hole! It's in the hole! It's in the hole!
quotes.author: Caddyshack

quotes.quote: Life is a banquet, and most poor suckers are starving to death!
quotes.author: Auntie Mame

quotes.quote: I feel the need—the need for speed!
quotes.author: Top Gun

quotes.quote: Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary.
quotes.author: Dead Poets Society

quotes.quote: Snap out of it!
quotes.author: Moonstruck

quotes.quote: My mother thanks you. My father thanks you. My sister thanks you. And I thank you.
quotes.author: Yankee Doodle Dandy

quotes.quote: Nobody puts Baby in a corner.
quotes.author: Dirty Dancing

quotes.quote: I'll get you, my pretty, and your little dog too!
quotes.author: The Wizard of Oz

quotes.quote: I'm the king of the world!
quotes.author: Titanic
